posts.message:
Some resources blame this " AppleID bruteforce tool via FindMyIphone bug " for the recent celebrity icloud hack 

the POC was published on GitHub shortly before the leak  ,i guess someone already had these celebrity ID's and was waiting for a bug to abuse them

posts.description: #hackapp @DefconRussia AppleID bruteforce tool via FindMyIphone bug. Doesn't lock AppleID. https://github.com/hackappcom/ibrute …

posts.message: هو ايه مصير الافكار اللى تم اختيارها ؟هنبدأ نكون تيمز و نشتغل عليهم امتى ؟

Guys, I'm overwhelmed by choice available on the interwebz. I need a simple wordpress popup plugin that allows me to write custom HTML content for the pop up and set a delay time (to allow visitors to read the page before showing the pop up). Anyone has some personal favourites for this?

شباب .. كنت عايز رأيكم فى تسجيل براءة اختراع لبرنامج معين .. هل دى حاجة مستحبة و للا مالهاش لازمة !! 
حد عمل براءة اختراع لبرنامج عنده قبل كده .. و ياترى ايه اللى اتسجل بالظبط !!
أفيضوا علينا مما تعلمون :) و شكرا مقدما  :)

You might think writing css is a piece of cake! You are Wrong! your css can screw up all the rendering of the page or can exhaust the browser in the render part.

Check this list of Videos You will like them :)

posts.description: To support WebSQL, we’ll use an IndexedDB polyfill. This will keep our code clean and easy to maintain, and once all browsers that we care about support IndexedDB natively, we can simply delete the polyfill.

posts.description: Before, during, and after my time in the [Front-End UX Design & Development Accelerator](https://www.codefellows.org/front-end-ux-design-and-development-accelerator), I kept a detailed list of my favorite books, infographics, websites, and articles.
